meanings.definition: Neat and orderly in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: Her room looked tidier after she organized her books and clothes.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen was tidier after she wiped down the counters and put away the dishes.
meanings.sent3: He always felt tidier after taking a shower and putting on fresh clothes.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked tidier after she trimmed the bushes and weeded the flower beds.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was tidier than ever with all the desks neatly arranged in rows.

meanings.definition: A person who tidies or cleans.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the tidier in the office because she always kept her desk spotless.
meanings.sent2: The tidier came in early every morning to make sure the rooms were clean and organized.
meanings.sent3: The tidier found a creative way to organize the cluttered closet by color-coding the clothes.
meanings.sent4: As the tidier of the group, he took pride in keeping their shared living space neat and tidy.
meanings.sent5: The hotel hired a new tidier to help maintain the cleanliness of the guest rooms.
